resources.string: Starting Point and Destination are same!
Starting Point or Consecutive destinations are same!
Are you sure want to go back home?
Maximum 5 destinations are allowed at a time
Are you sure want to exit?

This app is a prototype of our project.
 
It will help you to find out the shortest route to your destination.
 
It restrains only to the route places and not the exact display of the direction to the destination.
 
Till now it is confined to the geography of the DAIICT Campus.
 
There may be a chance of inaccuracy due to inaccurate or assumed distances.
For further help, you can refer the Help section available at the top-right menu on toolbar.\n \nHave a nice and safe journey.

The app includes the multi-destination feature, allowing user to effortlessly plan and navigate your journey by inputting multiple destinations with ease.
 
There is a predefined set of frequently visited places for the ease of user.
 
User is given choice to add and remove extra destinations.
 
Maximum 5 destinations are allowed to input at a time.
 
Record of the whole path is maintained in case the user wants to review the path as and when required.

This app is a prototype of our project.
 
It will help you to find out the shortest route to your destination.
 
It restrains only to the route places and not the exact display of the direction to the destination.
 
Till now it is confined to the geography of the DAIICT Campus.
 
There may be a chance of inaccuracy due to inaccurate or assumed distances.
Hope the above information will help you to navigate your way.\n \nEnjoy and have a nice and safe journey.
